channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Another jackpot surpasses $1 billion. Is this the new normal?
S Korean crypto-boss Do Kwon to be extradited to US
item.description: The man behind the collapse of terraUSD and Luna tokens faces fraud charges in the Unites States.

item.title: Utah man accidentally causes avalanche, rescues trapped brother
item.description: The unidentified pair of brothers and their father were snowmobiling on Christmas Eve when the avalanche swept through.

item.title: Biden to decide on Nippon Steel acquisition of U.S. Steel
item.description: President Biden has just over a week to decide how he wants to move forward on Nippon Steel's proposed acquisition of U.S. Steel. CBS News White House...

item.title: The costs of Trump "Border Czar" Tom Homan's plan to bring back migrant family detentions
item.description: In an interview with the Washington Post Thursday, President-elect Donald Trump's "border czar" pick Tom Homan said he was open to reintroducing famil...

item.title: Global stories from 2024 that we loved ... but that you may have missed
item.description: These stories didn't get huge numbers of views, but readers who found them stayed with them for what qualifies as an eternity on the online clock. Her...

item.title: Americans are exhausted by political news. TV ratings and a new AP-NORC poll show theyâ€™re tuning out
Nigeria denies colluding with France to destabilise Niger
item.description: Nigeria says Niger's accusations are "baseless" and "false".

item.title: North Korean soldier captured in Ukraine dies, reports say
item.description: The soldier is thought to be the first North Korean prisoner of war captured in the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

item.title: Rescue team ends search for a man overboard from Norwegian Cruise Line ship
item.description: The tragedy marks the 19th overboard incident on a cruise ship this year, with only two passengers successfully rescued.

item.title: How a fox skull shape conquers the snow
item.description: Research explains how foxes hunting mice can plunge down into the snow at high speeds without injuring their poor little snouts.

item.title: FDA wants new testing to detect asbestos in products with talc
item.description: The proposed rule is required under a law passed by Congress last year, and is intended to ensure the safety of makeup and baby powder.

item.title: US teacher jailed in Russia is formally designated as wrongfully detained
item.description: The State Department says an American schoolteacher arrested in Russia on drug charges more than four years ago has been designated by the U.S. govern...

item.title: Driver who killed dozens in China car attack sentenced to death
item.description: Fan Weiqiu was angry about his divorce settlement, and took it out on strangers, the court said.

item.title: U.S. sales of Hybrid and electric vehicle continue to lag behind gas-powered vehicles in 2024
item.description: 2024 saw a rise in U.S. sales of hybrid and electric cars, but more Americans are still buying gas-powered vehicles. Kevin Roberts, director of econom...

item.title: New leaders in Damascus call for cordial Syria ties with a resistant Israel
item.description: "Our problem is not with Israel. We don't want to meddle in anything that will threaten Israel's security," Damascus Governor Maher Marwan tells NPR. ...

item.title: Top global TikToks in 2024: Mr. Bean disciple, lip-synch for their life, baby hippo!

item.title: Iran arrests Italian reporter, Italy says
item.description: Cecilia Sala has been under arrest in Iran for more than a week, Italy's foreign ministry says.
